name: Thunderbird 3 - Main menu autohide
description: There were several same purposed styles in userstyles.org, but seems none of them still work on Thunderbird 3.x. Here is a CSS working on Thunderbird 3.x, with the latest logo (27 * 30 pixels). You can find other Thunderbird logos here: http://www.spreadthunderbird.com. Enjoy.
